content: 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge hook scissors other tools stitch marker darning needle measuring tape abbreviations us terms blo back loop only bean bean stitch chain chain double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st s stitch es x not applicable for that size special stitches and techniques bean stitch insert hook into designated st yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and insert your hook into the same st yarn over and pull up a loop 2 times yarn over and pull through 5 loops on hook yarn over and pull through remaining 2 loops on hook chainless this is simply a single_crochet at the start of a row or a round for which there is no chain before raise loop starting single_crochet on hook slightly insert hook into same st as join yarn over and pull up a loop 2 loops on hook yarn over and pull through both loops on hook invisible join remove hook from loop insert hook from back to front through first st of round put loop back on hook pull through st pull on loop a bit to adjust the look of your stitches julivia com © julivia all rights reserved triks yoj fo seldnub notes this pattern is written in us terms the skirt is worked from the top down starting with a ribbed waistband worked in row the body is then worked in rounds the shell border is added at the very end weave ends as needed need help with stitches or techniques visit www julivia com gauge 4 waistband is 1 5 /4 cm wide 4 /10 cm = 32 row before stretching body 4 x 4 /10 cm x 10 cm = 16 single_crochet x 19 rounds the beans will not really affect the gauge measured in pattern always check your gauge to check your gauge work in pattern until it is possible to measure your work against information above change the size of your hook to adjust if necessary julivia com © julivia all rights reserved triks yoj fo seldnub finished sizes pattern is written for 0-3 months size with larger sizes following in parentheses size changes are written in parentheses as follows 6-12 months 12-18 months 24 months 4 years 6 years 8 years 10 years ages used as a reference only note that the waistband will stretch out a large amount waist circumference size unstretched fits waist up to length yarn 0-3 mo 12 /30 5 cm 15 /38 cm 6 /15 cm 270 yd/135 g 6-12 mo 13 5 /34 5 cm 16 5 /42 cm 6 5 /16 5 cm 320 yd/160 g 12-18 mo 15 /38 cm 18 /45 5 cm 7 5 /19 cm 390 yd/195 g 24 mo 16 5 /42 cm 19 5 /49 5 cm 8 5 /21 5 cm 480 yd/240 g 4 y 18 /45 5 cm 21 /53 5 cm 10 5 /26 5 cm 660 yd/330 g 6 y 19 5
